id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-ecological-bioregional-teen learns bioregional water and energy systems
title: Teen learns bioregional water and energy systems
description: Teen learns bioregional water and energy systems
content:
Scenario: Teen learns bioregional water and energy systems
    Given Jasmine lives in a watershed with specific water dynamics
    And her consumption affects water and energy resources
    When her personal_agent explains resource connections
    Then it should teach her about local water sources and constraints
    And show how her choices affect regional water availability
    And explain energy systems powering her community
    And connect individual consumption to collective resource management
    And build understanding of herself as participant in bioregional systems
    And develop ecological citizenship grounded in local ecosystems
